channel.title: Comments on: Oracle Buys Sleepycat, Confirmed

item.title: By: Computerworld Blogs
item.dc:creator: Computerworld Blogs
item.content:encoded:
Oracle, BDB and future prediction…

Unless you missed it, Oracle bought Sleepycat software.
There are many conspiracy theories about Oracle’s motive. On the one hand, we have a big, commercial database company who is buying up companies that provide open source technology (they bought I…

Oracle bags the Sleepycat (and baby’s a beauty)…
